snippet: Federal authorities close in on hackers who stole data from JPMorgan. | Buyers flock to Santander’s subprime loan deal. | Cement giant seeks new merger terms. | S.E.C. shifts policy on admissions of guilt.
abstract: Federal authorities close in on hackers who stole data from JPMorgan. | Buyers flock to Santander’s subprime loan deal. | Cement giant seeks new merger terms. | S.E.C. shifts policy on admissions of guilt.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Authorities Circle JPMorgan Hackers
